summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 5 December to end of Sunday 5 December GMT
description: Sunday will be dry but overcast with maximum temperatures around 7 degrees.<br/><br/>A continuing Atlantic airflow will keep air pollution 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
